net.sourceforge.barcodegen.print.printer

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.barcodegen.print.printer.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Divish on 8/22/14. ConnectionManger will discover printers, create a connection and hold the Connetion Object for you Once a connection is created, its management like opening, closing and polling status is delegated to PrinterController Remmber to make sure to close a connection when exiting the Application Since the introduction of Driverless USB printing sdk update from Zebra,the whole system has been moved to discover only USB printers The original drivers had a bug where the driver would get slower after about 2000 labels but the driverless version does not have this issue so beware if you are migrating back to original drivers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static com.zebra.sdk.printer.discovery.DiscoveredUsbPrinter[] discoPrinters
      List of discovered printers
      static com.zebra.sdk.comm.Connection printerConnection
      Singleton connection to our printer THat means we can only connect to one printer at any time Not that this connection holds the printer which means no other application can connect to the same printer while the conenction is open
